articles.author: Rebecca Rubin
articles.title: ‘Den of Thieves 2’ Steals Box Office Crown With $15 Million, Robbie Williams Biopic ‘Better Man’ Tanks With $1 Million Debut - Variety
articles.description: Lionsgate's "Den of Thieves 2: Pantera" stole the box office crown, debuting at No. 1 with $15.5 million from 3,008 North American theaters.
articles.content:
Lionsgate’s heist thriller “Den of Thieves 2: Pantera” stole the box office crown, debuting at No. 1 with $15.5 million from 3,008 North American theaters.
The sequel to 2018’s “Den of Thieves” open… [+6124 chars]

articles.author: Hannah Ziegler
articles.title: Americans drank less alcohol even before the surgeon general weighed in - The Washington Post
articles.description: Consumption of alcoholic drinks was trending downward long before Surgeon General Vivek H. Murthy’s recent call for rethinking recommended limits.
articles.content:
The U.S. surgeon general wants to warn consumers about the health risks associated with alcohol. But many Americans especially younger ones may have already gotten the message.

articles.author: Nidhi Verma, Chen Aizhu, Siyi Liu, Florence Tan
articles.title: Tougher U.S. sanctions to curb Russian oil supply to China and India - Reuters
articles.description: Chinese and Indian refiners will source more oil from the Middle East, Africa and the Americas, boosting prices and freight costs.
